name: article-templates-app
title: Article templates
description: Allows you to create and manage article templates, create a template from an existing article, and create new articles from templates to streamline your Knowledge Base workflow.
changeNotes:
Version 1.1.0

  • Favorites & Quick Filter: Now you can mark templates as favorites! Just click the star icon next to a template name. Use the "Show favorites" toggle to quickly filter your list.
  • Author Tracking & Filtering: Templates now display who created them. A new "Author" column in the dashboard widget shows the creator's login, and you can use the multi-select filter to view templates from specific authors.
